name: Tigrillo Muerte
description:
still in alpha.

HELP ROSA SAVE TIGRILLO FROM XIBALBA

After an accident Tigrillo arrived at Xibalba, and it's now Rosa's job to rescue him from his terrible fate.


Controls

Known Bugs and Issues

  • Sometimes a dialogue continues restarting - Temp fix: press Q
  • Sometimes when starting a conversation the walk animation and audio continues
  • When collecting the statue and the beads the dialogue window doesn't automatically close - fix: press Q
  • Audio mixing needs work
  • No cutscenes
  • No Mac OS support

Would love to hear your feedback <3
